section.name: Tutorial
section.p: This is a simple step-by-step Betwixt tutorial focussing on creating a mapping for a RSS application.

subsection.name: The Object Model
subsection.p: Betwixt is a dynamic, start-from-java XML-object binder. For those unfamilar with these terms, this means that it maps XML <-> objects defining a binding from an existing group of java objects into xml (and back again) without the use of code generation.
